md:
giải nghĩa từ "compared" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

**compared** (verb)

* Meaning: to examine or consider two or more things in order to see how they are similar or different
* Vietnamese: so sánh

Example sentence: "The researchers compared the results of the two experiments to see if there were any differences."

**compared** (preposition)

* Meaning: in relation to something else; in comparison with something else
* Vietnamese: so với

Example sentence: "The new policy is more effective compared to the old one."

**compared** (adjective)

* Meaning: having been examined or considered in relation to something else
* Vietnamese: được so sánh

Example sentence: "The compared data showed that the two groups had similar results."

Related words:

* comparison (n.) - sự so sánh
* comparable (adj.) - có thể so sánh
* comparative (adj.) - so sánh
* compare (v.) - so sánh
